unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi Appoints New Director: A significant development in the medical landscape of India, the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Delhi has announced the appointment of Dr. Randeep Guleria as its new Director, effective 10/11/2024. This announcement follows a rigorous selection process, highlighting the institute's commitment to maintaining its position as a leading medical institution. Dr. Guleria, a renowned pulmonologist and previously a professor at the same institute, brings with him extensive experience in research, education, and patient care.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S Delhi Appoints New Director: A significant development in the medical landscape of India, the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (A-I-I-M-S) Delhi has announced the appointment of Doctor Randeep Guleria as its new Director, effective tenth November two thousand and twenty four. This announcement follows a rigorous selection process, highlighting the institute's commitment to maintaining its position as a leading medical institution. Doctor Guleria, a renowned pulmonologist and previously a professor at the same institute, brings with him extensive experience in research, education, and patient care.

unnormalised: Dr. Guleria's appointment is expected to further strengthen AIIMS Delhi's capabilities in various medical specialties. His expertise in respiratory medicine is particularly timely, given the increasing prevalence of respiratory ailments in the country. It is anticipated that under his leadership, AIIMS will focus on developing innovative treatments and preventive measures for respiratory diseases, aligning with the national healthcare priorities. The Ministry of Health and Family Welfare has lauded the selection, expressing confidence in Dr. Guleria's ability to lead AIIMS to new heights.
normalised: Doctor Guleria's appointment is expected to further strengthen A-I-I-M-S Delhi's capabilities in various medical specialties. His expertise in respiratory medicine is particularly timely, given the increasing prevalence of respiratory ailments in the country. It is anticipated that under his leadership, A-I-I-M-S will focus on developing innovative treatments and preventive measures for respiratory diseases, aligning with the national healthcare priorities. The Ministry of Health and Family Welfare has lauded the selection, expressing confidence in Doctor Guleria's ability to lead A-I-I-M-S to new heights.

unnormalised: The outgoing director, Dr. Sunil Kumar, served the institution diligently for the past 5 years, overseeing significant advancements in medical technology and infrastructure. His contributions to AIIMS Delhi have been widely acknowledged, and he will be transitioning to an advisory role within the Ministry of Health. Dr. Kumar wished Dr. Guleria the best, stating he is confident that he will excel in his new role.
normalised: The outgoing director, Doctor Sunil Kumar, served the institution diligently for the past five years, overseeing significant advancements in medical technology and infrastructure. His contributions to A-I-I-M-S Delhi have been widely acknowledged, and he will be transitioning to an advisory role within the Ministry of Health. Doctor Kumar wished Doctor Guleria the best, stating he is confident that he will excel in his new role.

unnormalised: Numerous healthcare professionals and organizations have welcomed Dr. Guleria's appointment, citing his dedication to patient welfare and his commitment to advancing medical knowledge. The Indian Medical Association (IMA) released a statement congratulating Dr. Guleria and expressing its support for his vision for AIIMS Delhi. The IMA emphasized the importance of collaboration between medical institutions and healthcare professionals to improve the overall healthcare system in the country.
normalised: Numerous healthcare professionals and organizations have welcomed Doctor Guleria's appointment, citing his dedication to patient welfare and his commitment to advancing medical knowledge. The Indian Medical Association (I-M-A) released a statement congratulating Doctor Guleria and expressing its support for his vision for A-I-I-M-S Delhi. The I-M-A emphasized the importance of collaboration between medical institutions and healthcare professionals to improve the overall healthcare system in the country.

unnormalised: In conclusion, the appointment of Dr. Randeep Guleria as the new Director of AIIMS Delhi marks a significant milestone for the institute. With his extensive experience and expertise, Dr. Guleria is well-positioned to lead AIIMS Delhi in its mission to provide high-quality medical care, conduct cutting-edge research, and train the next generation of medical professionals. The medical community eagerly anticipates the positive impact of his leadership on the healthcare sector in India.
